DOC.detailed_description: This trial non-randomized , multi-center , prospective study subject symptomatic , paroxysmal atrial fibrillation ( PAF ) . The purpose study investigate confirm safety , efficacy efficiency Medtronic Ablation Frontiers® Cardiac Ablation System use treatment paroxysmal AF . The trial conduct 2 year period enrollment occur 4 October 2007 1 December 2008 .
